alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:31PM EST until January 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause blowing snow to drift. * WHERE...Southern Cayuga, Onondaga and Madison counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could quickly and significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the late evening and morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
